You may play Saproling Symbiosis any time you could play an instant if you pay {2} more to play it.

Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play for each creature you control.
mc.printedText:
You may play Saproling Symbiosis any time you could play an instant if you pay {2} more to play it.
Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play for each creature you control.

mc.name: Wash Out
mc.oracleText: Return all permanents of the color of your choice to their owners' hands.
mc.printedText: Return all permanents of the color of your choice to their owners' hands.
mc.flavorText:
"Rest now. You've neither won nor lost, but this battle is over for you just the same."
--Teferi

mc.name: Rewards of Diversity
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent plays a multicolored spell, you gain 4 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever an opponent plays a multicolored spell, you gain 4 life.
mc.flavorText:
"Everything is in place. Nothing can happen that isn't part of my plan."
--Urza

mc.name: Llanowar Elite
mc.oracleText:
Kicker {8} (You may pay an additional {8} as you play this spell.)

Trample

If the kicker cost was paid, Llanowar Elite comes into play with five +1/+1 counters on it.
mc.printedText:
Kicker {8} (You may pay an additional {8} as you play this spell.)
Trample
If you paid the kicker cost, Llanowar Elite comes into play with five +1/+1 counters on it.

mc.name: Dueling Grounds
mc.oracleText:
No more than one creature can attack each turn.
No more than one creature can block each turn.
mc.printedText:
No more than one creature may attack each turn.
No more than one creature may block each turn.
mc.flavorText:
"You think you can stop me?" hissed Tsabo.
"I think I can kill you," replied Gerrard.

mc.name: Tainted Well
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
When Tainted Well comes into play, draw a card.
Enchanted land is a Swamp.
mc.printedText:
When Tainted Well comes into play, draw a card.
Enchanted land is a swamp.
mc.flavorText:
"No, you get the water. I ain't thirsty."
--Squee

mc.name: Searing Rays
mc.oracleText: Choose a color. Searing Rays deals damage to each player equal to the number of creatures of that color that player controls.
mc.printedText: Choose a color. Searing Rays deals damage to each player equal to the number of creatures of that color that player controls.
mc.flavorText:
"This is a battle of pawns, for the highest stakes imaginable."
--Urza

mc.name: Saproling Infestation
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player pays a kicker cost, you put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player pays a kicker cost, you put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play.
mc.flavorText: "My army took centuries to gather," remarked Urza. "Yavimaya seems to conjure hers out of thin air."

mc.name: Barrin's Spite
mc.oracleText: Choose a player and two target creatures that player controls. The player chooses and sacrifices one of them. Return the other to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Choose two target creatures controlled by one player. That player chooses and sacrifices one of them. Return the other to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText:
"Only vengeance matters now."
--Barrin

mc.name: Stalking Assassin
mc.oracleText:
{3}{U}, {T}: Tap target creature.
{3}{B}, {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.
mc.printedText:
{3}{U}, {T}: Tap target creature.
{3}{B}, {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

mc.name: Dromar's Attendant
mc.oracleText: {1}, Sacrifice Dromar's Attendant: Add {W}{U}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {1}, Sacrifice Dromar's Attendant: Add {W}{U}{B} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: "Dromar is the wings of the ur-dragon, sweeping away all opposition."

mc.name: Crosis's Attendant
mc.oracleText: {1}, Sacrifice Crosis's Attendant: Add {U}{B}{R} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {1}, Sacrifice Crosis's Attendant: Add {U}{B}{R} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: "Crosis is the eye of the ur-dragon, piercing illusion and darkness."

mc.name: Darigaaz's Attendant
mc.oracleText: {1}, Sacrifice Darigaaz's Attendant: Add {B}{R}{G} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {1}, Sacrifice Darigaaz's Attendant: Add {B}{R}{G} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: "Darigaaz is the breath of the ur-dragon, burning away the burdens of mortality."

mc.name: Rith's Attendant
mc.oracleText: {1}, Sacrifice Rith's Attendant: Add {R}{G}{W} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {1}, Sacrifice Rith's Attendant: Add {R}{G}{W} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: "Rith is the claw of the ur-dragon, scattering seeds of devastation."

mc.name: Treva's Attendant
mc.oracleText: {1}, Sacrifice Treva's Attendant: Add {G}{W}{U} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {1}, Sacrifice Treva's Attendant: Add {G}{W}{U} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: "Treva is the voice of the ur-dragon, demanding cries of worship."

Flying
Urborg Drake attacks each turn if able.

Flying

mc.flavorText: Relentless as the sea, remorseless as death.

mc.name: Captain Sisay
mc.oracleText: {T}: Search your library for a legendary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {T}: Search your library for a Legend or legendary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: Her leadership forged the Weatherlight's finest crew.

mc.name: Hanna, Ship's Navigator
mc.oracleText: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: "I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker, not a destroyer."

mc.name: Protective Sphere
mc.oracleText: {1}, Pay 1 life: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice that shares a color with the mana spent on this activation cost. (Colorless mana prevents no damage.)
mc.printedText: {1}, Pay 1 life: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice that shares a color with the mana spent on this activation cost. (Colorless mana prevents no damage.)

mc.name: Harsh Judgment
mc.oracleText:
As Harsh Judgment comes into play, choose a color.

If an instant or sorcery spell of the chosen color would deal damage to you, it deals that damage to its controller instead.
mc.printedText:
As Harsh Judgment comes into play, choose a color.
If an instant or sorcery of the chosen color would deal damage to you, it deals that damage to its controller instead.
mc.flavorText:
"At least they remember me."
--Gerrard

mc.name: Psychic Battle
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player chooses one or more targets, each player reveals the top card of his or her library. The player who reveals the card with the highest converted mana cost may change the target or targets. If two or more cards are tied for highest cost, the target or targets remain unchanged. Changing targets this way doesn't trigger this ability.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player chooses one or more targets, each player reveals the top card of his or her library. The player who reveals the card with the highest converted mana cost may change the target or targets. If two or more cards are tied for highest cost, the target or targets remain unchanged.

mc.name: Vodalian Merchant
mc.oracleText: When Vodalian Merchant comes into play, draw a card, then discard a card.
mc.printedText: When Vodalian Merchant comes into play, draw a card, then discard a card from your hand.
mc.flavorText: Not choosing sides in a war can be dangerous--but lucrative.

mc.name: Ravenous Rats
mc.oracleText: When Ravenous Rats comes into play, target opponent discards a card.
mc.printedText: When Ravenous Rats comes into play, target opponent discards a card from his or her hand.
mc.flavorText: Nothing is sacred to the rats. Everything is simply another meal.

mc.name: Phyrexian Infiltrator
mc.oracleText: {2}{U}{U}: Exchange control of Phyrexian Infiltrator and target creature. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText: {2}{U}{U}: Exchange control of Phyrexian Infiltrator and target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"It is Yawgmoth's will incarnate: an efficient machine that replaces inefficient flesh."
--Tsabo Tavoc

Flying
Metathran Transport can't be blocked by blue creatures.
{U}: Target creature becomes blue until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Metathran Transport can't be blocked by blue creatures.

mc.name: Tsabo's Decree
mc.oracleText: Choose a creature type. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all creature cards of that type. Then destroy all creatures of that type that player controls. They can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Choose a creature type. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all creature cards of that type from it. Then destroy all creatures of that type that player controls. They can't be regenerated.

mc.name: Stand or Fall
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your combat phase, separate all creatures defending player controls into two piles. Only creatures in the pile of that player's choice can block this turn.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your combat phase, separate all creatures defending player controls into two face-up piles. Only creatures in the pile of that player's choice may block this turn.

mc.name: Quirion Sentinel
mc.oracleText: When Quirion Sentinel comes into play, add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: When Quirion Sentinel comes into play, add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: All elvenkind stood against Phyrexia. The Quirion nation deployed its most spiritual adepts, who wielded the power of their native soil.

mc.name: Elvish Champion
mc.oracleText: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They're unblockable as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
mc.printedText: All Elves get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They're unblockable as long as defending player controls a forest.)
mc.flavorText:
"For what are leaves but countless blades
To fight a countless foe on high."
--Skyshroud hymn
